Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Requires travel insurance companies to provide refunds for travel cancelled due to coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)
Summary: Requires travel insurance companies to provide refunds for travel cancelled due to coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
LawCode: Add ยง157-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to travel insurance companies providing refunds for travel cancelled due to coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19); and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
